name: FALL AND RISE
description:
Hello, everyone!

I want to present you my first project - Fall and Rise!

Your task is simple

Dodge falling platforms and get to the exit.

I would be very grateful if you write an opinion on the game. 

Have fun!!!

Assets :

Character:https://rgsdev.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-skeleton-character-pack-rgsdev

Music:https://devtrap.itch.io/pixel-tune-collection

Tileset:https://quintino-pixels.itch.io/dark-castle-8-bit-tileset
